summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. from April 1 to April 30, 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting the financial activities of the account during this period.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Account Statement Summary

events.title: Outgoing Foreign Exchange Transfer
events.description: A foreign exchange transfer of EUR 15,000 was made, resulting in a debit of $18,542.78.

locations: 6100 Red 1400K Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of April 30, 2018, was $323,031.10.
An outgoing foreign exchange transfer of EUR 15,000 occurred on April 3, 2018, resulting in a significant debit.
Interest payment of $186.46 was credited to the account on April 30, 2018.
Service charges and fees totaled $50.00 during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
